Blog.post: hello.. haha.. nw thn got the chance to blog again.. coz this few days too busy liao.. n got a lot of hmwk to do.. n working summore.. haiz... n this few days my bro is using the comp.. tat's y nv use comp.. k la.. all this is my reason le.. tell u wat happen recently.. haiz.. nw headache ar.. coz BSA (Business Software Application) project i haven even touch thn gonna pass up this cuming thousday.. still dunno wat to do.. haiz.. was planning not to do it n juz get a 0 can liao.. but cannot la.. haiz.. k la.. this put aside le.. nw is frens.. y yesterday saw yixia n vivian like i dunno them like tat as vivian told mi yesterday... haiz.. maybe is too long nv see each other liao thn like tat le.. haiz.. i think dun say too much le... next time blog liao thn say.. bye..

haiz... i nw very jealousy.. but is kinda childish if i jealous coz of my sis.. but is really unfair.. my sis birthday can had a very nice expensive birthday cake.. but mi lehz.. even a Pandan Cake also dun haf... Wat The Hell man.. but nvm la.. bro nw got treat mi pizza can liao lo.. haha.. k la.. dunno wat to write le.. bye...

haiz.. nw in school.. but hor.. school starts at 1215.. but my fren at first say wanna do BSA (Business Software Applications) project.. actually meet at 10 to do.. but when i was on my way.. my fren sms mi say tat she not mood to do it liao.. so nw at access room to update my blog... haha.. but better than nth la.. coz got air-con... at home use dun haf... haha.. but must b careful.. coz teacher will suddenly cum up n do a spot check.. haha.. but hu cares.. also like tat.. dun care.. hmm.. nw listening to S.H.E - Shi Mian Mai Fu.. haiz.. dunno whether today Nina will return my F.I.R disc a not.. coz very miss my disc la.. but hor.. hiya.. forget it.. k la.. stop here le.. wanna go do other things... bye.. blog again tonight after st.. ard 10 to 11 plus k.. bye..

hmm... at first tot got blog liao can tell watever i wan inside.. but hor.. after got blog liao like nothing to write liao.. haha.. very funny hor mi.. stupid sia... hahaha.. hmm.. still thinking.. ok.. say abt my past.. hmm.. when i first came in to ITE ba.. haha.. tat time i was very very very dao one.. haha.. dunno y also.. got ppl tok to mi.. but i nv tok to ppl.. hahaha.. mayb i tot i'm cool tat time.. haha.. very BHB man.. hmm.. thn nw lehz.. end up also got frens.. but got misunderstanding wif each other.. so nw only got few few frens nia.. haha.. but nw ok le.. so wat pass juz let it b lo.. already like tat le.. so juz face the reality lo.. if ppl dun face the reality, how they look forward on their future right.. last time de mi is not like nw.. last time de mi is very stupid, foolish, stubborn lots of bad points la.. thn last time also dun dare to face reality de.. but nw lehz.. watever happens.. i'll juz let it be.. coz if nv haf the cause how to haf the effect right... like the volcano also.. it will erupt anytime one... nobody knws wat will happen the next second... an example: like at 5 mins ago i hao hao de.. but after tat 5 mins, mayb i'll fell down or suddenly down on fever i also dunno right.. so juz let the time be lo.. we can't turn back our history.. wat i'm saying.. haha.. i also dunno.. but juz wanna say tat if history allow us to turn back.. i wan to remain myself as a sec sch student forever.. coz there's a lot of memories over there.. i remember during sec 3, i got a lot of frens.. frm acad for 7 le (good frens).. thn my class plus got 7 le.. total 14 ma.. thn everyday after sch wil gather behind the NPCC Room the bench there.. thn got one time we are very bored till feel like playing games... thn suddenlt got NCC guys playing soccer.. thn we borrow the soccer ball from them n juz play lo... haha.. we play wif our sch uniform summore.. (coz Principal says tat we cannot wear sch uniform to play any sports games.. but we heck care.. haha..) but teachers see liao also at there clap.. they say nth.. haha.. teachers still says: "WAH.. GIRLS SOCCER TEAM AR..." thn like tat lo... hmm.. nw u all knw y i wanna go back to sec sch times le ma? haha.. k la.. stop here le.. bye..

hmm.. yesterday dun get the chance to use comp.. haiz.. coz actually wanna online at abt 8 - 9+ like tat... thn nvm lo.. my bro came back home frm work.. thn let him use lor.. if nv let him use.. later quarrel.. i dun like la.. se let him play.. thn nw got the chance coz he went to bath.. so i'll tk over.. haha.. hmm.. tok abt yesterday, tat stupid CUR (Customer Relation) teacher call us to research on the Service Mission (means tat go find out the company goal).. stupid right? thn i find till going to bang myself to the wall liao.. so i sms my classmate cum pri sch fren, Aniza, asked her whether she finish her assignment.. thn she said, finish liao.. thn i ask her whether today can pass it to me n copy a not.. thn she juz say ok.. haha.. so happy.. thn no need to worry abt that le.. thn today got PE.. thn teacher says tat got Trial Running Test.. thn he says run for 1Km within 7 minutes.. but i failed in the end.. wanna knw y.. coz b4 starting the run teacher tighten our shoelace... thn after i tighten one was going to tighten the other one.. but.. haven even tight the other one thn teacher says start.. tat's y i failed.. coz i run for till 250m thn i stop n tied my shoelace.. by the time my leg cannot tk it already... so how leh.. like tat lo.. coz after u run very hard thn suddenly stop will lower down my stamina.. tat's y i failed.. haha.. but nvm la.. fail fail lo.. big deal ar... haha.. no ppl care..as long as i happy can liao.. k la.. stop here le.. bye...

morning.. haiz.. last night actually wanna blog de.. but my bro i ask him how long he will b using? he said, very very long.. thn i waited lo.. i wait wait wait... but still haven use finish.. haiz.. like tat jiu suan le lo.. thn when to bed le.. haha.. yesterday at st actually is i b leader de.. but suddenly huiqing came wif her ex-bf.. same age as mi also.. haha.. but he dun like ger younger thn him la.. but hor.. i also not interested in him la.. look like S.H.E de Ella lehz.. haha.. hmm... k la.. tok abt NOW in the morning.. juz slept for 6 to 7 hours only.. coz my hse downstairs got ppl "mati".. thn the ppl down there building the temp place to put the person's coffin in either three or five or seven days for ppl to visit him.. means to give him the last respect n see him the last time before he was send to burn.. haiz.. coz they do things must b very fast.. thn must drag things here n there.. thn the noise wake mi up lo.. thn nvm.. today my mother is tking care of baby.. thn baby keep on slp till halfway thn shout at us to call us to make her slp again.. haha.. she keep on shouting at my bro: "Er Ge" or duno how: "Oie".. haha.. cute right? haiz.. nw keep on yawning.. but still can't slp.. hmm.. nvm la.. lucky today lesson starts at 1.15.. haha.. so good.. k la.. nw i gtg liao.. bye bye.. blog again after i reach home...

morning everyone.. haiz... juz wake up only thn keep on sneezing.. used up 5 to 6 pkts of tissues liao.. actually wanna let u knw something but dun wanna say liao.. i scare ppl will avoid mi if i say it out.. haha.. haiz... nw still using tissue to stuck my nose.. or esle keep on having "chendol" out from my nose.. haha.. sianz.. no ppl online.. k la.. stop here le.. nose very uncomfortable.. very itchy... k le.. bye.. blog again tonight..

hello.. back to my blog again.. haiz.. real headache today.. haha.. coz i think tat my blog title is quite lame.. hmm.. anyone out there got suggestion? if got give mi comments k... haha.. k la.. abt tonight ar.. tml thn say lo.. haha.. juz to say tat very sad tat my st fren n her ex-boyfriend divorce le.. haiz.. wat a waste.. they already engaged for 3 years already.. but thn yesterday divorce le.. haiz.. why? why? why? haiz.. i can feel tat she's is sad today coz today at st, i notice that she look very moody.. but i keep on playing wif her... at least got laugh la.. but i think her laughing is like being force by me one.. coz she already got such a big outbreak liao.. thn i still play wif her.. dunno whether she will think much a not.. hope she wun.. if she can share her problems to mi like wat my dear did.. thn she wun b so fan.. at least she say out still can feel better inside her right? mayb is she think's tat i'm still young ba.. but our age difference is 2 years only.. hu bother abt age right... age is not a problem.. is depend on u trust tat person a not.. hmm.. mayb she dun trust mi coz past few years i'm those siao siao KPO type.. let her have a impression tat i'm not trustable.. haha.. so nvm lo.. if time cum's if she willing to tell mi thn juz listen to her problem lo.. if she nv say thn nvm lo.. coz is depend on whether she wanna say not mi.. haha.. k la.. stop here le.. bye.. nightz...

hmm.. this morning is rather cold because raining ma.. thn rain so heavily.. very nice to slp man.. but everytime nice to slp but wake up not the same liao.. must worry this worry tat.. haiz.. my sister.. nw she's pri 6 having PSLE liao... but she still diao er lang dang.. really dunno wat she wants.. i worrying abt her maths.. coz maths in PSLE is important also.. like eng like tat.. but she still dun care dun do.. anyhow write.. y anyhow write? coz of st.. wat the hell man.. y coz of st thn anyhow do.. after she join st... i was very stress... really dunno wat to do.. after joining, my life in st n at home was not so carefree as last time.. coz in st.. haf to tk care of her.. n her mouth.. haiz... damn KPO.. dunno y la.. mayb affect by mi last time.. but nw i'm not.. nw is her turn.. haiz.. if she nv talk.. ppl wun tot tat she's mute.. since 10 am.. she's doing her maths till nw.. when i go n check.. all are rubbish answer.. i ask her y.. she says: i anyhow put the ans inside.. haiz.. i really can't bear to beat her up or wat.. coz violent wun solve the problem.. so y must tk this burden to beat her up like hell.. one word to phase it.. USELESS.. y useless?? coz even though beaten her up like hell.. ppl will tot tat i'm a crazy ger tat beat my sister anyhow.. but ppl dun understand mi.. even my parents also dun understand n trust mi at all.. wat can i do.. always rely on frens... no.. i dun wish too..my problems i'll solve myself.. i wun let ppl help in watever way.. coz after elaine tat lesson.. i dun wan to rely on ppl le.. i must learn defend myself... so i'll knw wat to do if something happens to mi.. hmm.. i stop here le.. tonight will blog again.. bye.. miss ya..

hello.. hmm.. so happy.. coz got own blog liao... ppl can put their secret inside.. i also can.. haha.. kinda guai lan ar mi.. haha.. today quite happy lo.. went to huiting's hse n sing karaoke.. better thn nth.. coz no need to waste $$.. haha.. hmm.. i think i'll continue tml... nitez...

hmm.. today really very bo liao.. this afternoon Zi Hui came my hse n do her project.. but hor, end up she cum my hse use comp for friendster.. n one thing is tat i n her very careless man.. when she board in the bus, she sms mi, said tat her diskette still in my hse.. thn tml returning her lo.. haiz.. actually wanna watch Twin Effect II with Hui Ting de.. but she not free.. thn nvm lo.. other day ba.. but 7th month cuming le.. how to watch? haiz.. thn tml Chia Yun cuming my hse also.. haha.. so happy.. but she came here do her D 'n' T project.. so tml dun fan her let her do properly.. coz is her 'O' Level de ba.. haha.. nvm.. k la.. stop here le.. or esle Hui Ling says she wait till her hair white liao.. haha.. coz she wanna see my blog.. so faster type faster finish.. k la.. bye..

yo.. back le.. hmm.. nw very energentic man.. feel high wanna sing out LOUD... haha.. lame right.. haiz.. juz nw when down to see other ppl's siang tng.. hmm.. not bad la.. diff only.. k la.. state out the difference frm my siang tng to others siang tng... they sit down sing one.. we stand up sing one.. they use mic sing de.. we use our own voice one(more power).. hahaha.. prasing my own workplace.. BHB.. but hor.. they salary rate is higher than mine lehz.. i only earn $20+ a day.. they even more man.. they got $30+.. haiz.. y my siang tng so niao.. haiz.. too bad.. coz different company name ma.. mine company's name is nicer.. popular in Singapore also.. my company name is called "Yun Nan Shang Tang(Chi) or Hoon Nam Siang Tng(Dialect).. that side is call "Hua De Shang Tang(Chi) or Hua Teck Siang Tng(Dialect).. haha..got lots of different... hmm.. so must gain experience from other siang tng.. haha.. i gain quite a lot liao.. i saw ard 6 to 7 siang tng b4 le.. but i still thinks tat Hoon Nam Siang Tng is the BEST... haha.. Hoon Nam rox~~!! k la.. stop here le.. or esle ppl say i'm a workholic... hahaha.. bye..

hahaha.. today nv go sch.. coz auntie visit till very xin ku.. thn stomach very pain.. so nv go lo.. later thn go n see doctor.. haiz.. sch reopen le.. so fast.. **sIgHz** sian man.. was wishing tat can grad faster since the time r cuming nearer.. heex.... faster grad ar.. thn can slack at home for a period.. thn when it's time thn i'll go out find a suitable job for myself to do.. but i definatly will nv help out in my father's factory de.. the reason cannot tell la.. coz not nice ar.. if ppl see liao go out anyhow spread.. thn sure very shame de.. so better dun say it out.. hahaha.. haiz... last fri was so high man in sch.. nw lehz.. like a dead person like tat.. haiz.. was thinking to change something.. but dunno change liao ppl will say ma? haiz.. hiya.. dun say out.. i change myself can liao.. haha.. k la.. stop here le.. bye bye..

hahaha.. finally finish my BSA le.. hahaha... so happy.. n got long holidays although going to end very fast.. hmm.. today got training for my work there.. i nv pass.. :'( coz my voice not good.. summore i sick lehz... hmm.. today Suying jie sms mi again.. she sms: how r u le? ok le ma? i replied her: ok liao.. hmm.. today i have help a fren of mine.. dun say the name out.. let her go find out over here.. she lost her wallet but she still dunno abt it.. haha.. see how blur she is.. haha.. actually i also duno de.. is juz nw ard 8+ i juz woke up from my afternoon nap.. thn i go wash up.. after tat hse phone rang, mother answer the phone(coz the phone is beside her only.. heex..) thn my mother said is my elder bro find mi.. thn go answer lo.. thn he suddenly ask.. u knw a girl name XXX frm ur ex-sec sch ma? i said knw ar.. wat happen to her?!?!?! at first got a bit puzzled, coz she so guai.. i tot wat had happen to her.. thn i continue wif my bro.. he said someone found her wallet n bring it to the police station n is my bro handling this case.. so i go call her n ask whether she knw a not lo.. but she dunno at all.. haha.. but nvm la... she knw can liao lo.. thn after she go claim back her wallet, she call mi out say wanna gimme a treat.. but i say nvm la.. juz a small case.. no need to treat la... thn she keep on insisted wanna treat.. thn i juz tell her.. k lo.. next time k.. thn she say ok lo.. thn hanged up phone liao.. haha.. coz this year she's busying wif her 'O' Level.. so i was think not to go n find her n company of frens first... wanna find them after their 'O' Level lo.. nvm de ma.. sure got chance to meet up de right.. heex... sian ar.. nw is already 0137 hours liao i still haven slp.. mayb is juz nw tat nap is abt 3 hrs de problem le ba... coz i 6+ slp 8+ woke up coz of some noise... thn nw like tat lo.. k la.. stop here le..

hmm.. i'm sick for a few days le... till nw still nee a little bit more rest to recover.. coz weather too hot liao.. so will get sick easily.. last few days suffer a lot.. will feel dizzy easily, cough n a bit of flu... so ppl out there must drink a lot of water hor.. coz weather not good.. hmm.. dun say abt this le.. say abt others de.. like today, morning go rush my project.. coz actually sld b Thursday, 5th Aug, pass up de.. but got presentation ma.. so i bluff teacher tat i wed thn present.. haha.. thn today juz started.. but end today also.. haha.. so happy... hahaha.. thn found out tat my assignment at thursday de still haven complete.. Opps... hahaha.. so juz completed all the things.. haha.. monday can relax le.. n forgot to say.. today xiaoyan treat mi eat Pizza at Pizza Hut.. hahaha.. eat till very full man.. till 11 pm thn reach home.. haha.. but nvm la.. long long one time go hm late.. haha.. k la..gtg le.. my bro tking over.. bye..

haiz.. very headache.. coz left only a bit of time to pass up the project.. thn thursday do the presentation.. i'm getting sick for this already.. coz i hate project.. like my mother says: " why sch always ask u do project to waste money n time??" i was thinking tat if sch only got studying n writing will b good le.. got exam at the end of the year n juz get the cert n can fly le.. haiz... dunno y in the first place i study over here? haiz.. is really very bored man.. i think tat i'm wasting my parents money to study in this stupid sch... i hate it man.. dunno y also.. haiz.... nw i juz can say haiz haiz haiz... n wat esle i can do? so sianz.. thn the stupid yahoo n msn can't find the information i wan.. ARHH.. very angry nw... k la.. blog again later.. bye..

haiz... today dunno y like got lots of problems inside mi.. hmm.. how to say ne? i also dunno how to say it? haiz.. is like something bothering mi for quite sometimes liao.. coz when i busy, i wun think much.. haiz.. when i got things bothering mi on my mind, i would try to make myself very busy till i'm too tired to think anything.. but is minor things thn nvm lo.. juz will make myself busy n tat's it lo.. but comes into BGR, i think i very sway in tat.. dun say abt the thing happen liao.. juz say will i do can liao.. haha.. if got BGR things bothering mi i'll make myself xtra xtra xtra busy.. thn i wun cry over it.. but first time tat time i really cried in my work place.. but is nobody de place.. luckily man.. haiz... i think in my this lifetime.. i wun haf any relationship de la.. hiya.. dun say liao.. i gtg liao.. bye...

haiz... this morning juz as usual, wake up, go brush teeth, wash face n see hp.. thn found out tat my hp low batt le... thn go charge lo... thn suddenly very hungry.. thn go make milo for myself to drink.. thn nvm lo.. my mother was cutting pork.. thn suddenly when she cut till halfway, she go cut her thumb.. kaoz.. so much BLOOD man.. thn i tat time got a bit panic liao.. but still must maintain calm.. but the pro is my mother panic till her hand shake man.. thn make mi more n more panic.. thn i suddenly shout at her: " SHUT UP LA.. VERY CAO TILL I KAN CHEONG..." thn she shut up... haha.. thn i help her put plaster lo... buay tahan her man... KNS.. thn nw she ok liao lo.. haiz.. see like wat i saw in my previous blog... i said tat nobody knws wat will happen the next second... so juz let the time be lo.. we can't turn back our history.. tat's wat i meant le.. hahah.. k la.. going off le.. bye..
